updated_cases.title: Verify that transaction event generation can be disabled by a config parameter
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that transaction event generation can be disabled by a config parameter
updated_cases.custom_preconds: >Stack should be up and running >Required policies must be configured >Basic flow should work fine
updated_cases.custom_steps: 1. Validate the transaction event config is taken into account. When the set criterias are reached transaction events will be emitted and sent to transaction event receiver machine
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. >No errors should be seen >Transaction event generated from DP side must be propagated to MP Components
